title: Does Zoe's ult make her invulnerable momentarily?
body: I feel like for a very brief moment, she ults in and out of her portal twice and she's off the map. Would that make her invulnerable?

replies.body: Zoe's targetable and vulnerable to damage throughout her ult.
does that mean she can get cc-ed? and not tp back?
She still TPs back while CC'd
also through invulnerables (bard's R)? If she dies from a bleed effect and has GA? Even while grounded? Through **everything**? (With camille she will tp back but will be dragged back in right?)
With Camille, I can see Zoe teleporting back, but instantly being dragged into the zone.
That's bullshit
Even through grounded, knock ups, displacements, suppressions, etc?

She jumps out of a portal, then falls back in.
So none of that will do anything.
You are absolutely sure Blitz couldn't pull her out of it?
Well she's connected to the hole, so it pulls her back in.

You know she is connected to the hole and can't be displaced from it like Malzahar ult aoe? This will literally be answered in a few hours, but I find it awfully hard to believe you know anything for certain.

It was already answered are you blind......

>AnataBakka (EUW)  - about 6 hours ago
does that mean she can get cc-ed? and not tp back?

>Reav3 (NA)  - about 5 hours ago
She still TPs back while CC'd

A RIOT EMPLOYEE told someone directly (which you replied to) she will still TP back, but you are like "Nah bro, we don't know that for sure". Are you serious? Brains exist for a reason, turn yours back on.

I asked for clarification on edge cases (which nearly every champion in the game has edge cases) which you aren't giving me, I find it highly unlikely that a dash with a 6 second cool down would be entirely immune to cc especially on a mage. No one asked for your uninformed input so don't be mad when I tell you that you literally don't know the answer to my question.

There is no clarification to be had.
She will still be teleported while CC'd, end of story.
Just like how Tristana can still Rock Jump while CC'd except this is a 100% of the time case.

nope blitz and naut grabs don't cancel her ult.
oops sorry for the double necro.
what about lissandra r?
Can she cancel her return R through any means? Like can she flash, Zhonya's, or Cleanse to cancel the return?
The tooltip says you're "not allowed to move", so I guess not. Not sure, but we'll see tomorrow when it's on PBE.

I imagine this is a better Q and A question, but was there a version of this in which Zoe wasn't targetable or vulnerable?

She looks great, by the way. Cheers to the whole team that worked on her!!
As per mobility abilites it will problly be a 60 second cooldown early to mid 20's later without cdr
Its cool down is 10/8/6 seconds according to the top thread on the boards right now.
just when you think you can predict op they blow past that shit and set a new standard.
